name: Eunid: Summon Els
description:
Fight alone or summon other players and defend the realm of Eunid against evil summoners. Summon your Els to vanquish the corrupted summoners and their Els.

Controls:

Mouse 1 = Attack
Space = Jump
A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow = Move Left/Move Right
Esc = Show Menu

Game Created by:

Adi - Lead Programmer
Obow - Programmer
Akusan - Art/Animation
Jae - Music/SFX
